channel.title: [PI] Fatal Error after monster killed
channel.description:
Hi all, After I kill KBD or a Black Dragon, Currently only npc's i have found to cause this. Ignore the hit, Adjusted my strength level to test monsters faster.
Here's exactly what happens: http://postimg.org/image/rhu5lsn5z/
Here's my console right after the disconnect: http://prntscr.com/1ofo9y
Any help is much appreciated!

item.title: [PI] Fatal Error after monster killed
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

I rewrote the kbd drops, removed the miscRandom’s and I got it working fine now. It was something to do with miscRandom.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fatal Error after monster killed
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Check if the kbd is dropping some sort of null in your NPC death method.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fatal Error after monster killed
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:529083”][quote author=iBucky link=topic=647836.msg4357204#msg4357204 date=1377920518]

That 3:
Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][3]
Change it to a 2. If it still errors, change it to a 1.

Change it to 1 and kill it a bunch of times, see if it drops anything

Thanks!

I have issues though, When i changed it to 2, The NPC would drop like 8 items including rares.
When I changed it to 1, It would not drop any items…

Any idea?
[/quote][/quote]

Killed around 80, Got 2 drops, Marentill and Tarromin.

Read full topic
